Posts.Content: HELLO 2 WEEKS AGO I FOUND A LUMP ON MY LEFT BREST I WENT FOR A MAMOGRAM AND A ULTRA SOUND THEY BOTH SHOW NOTHING HOWEVER THE FOUND A SPOT ON MY LEFT THAT CHANGED FROM LAST YEARS TEST THE REPORT SAID IT WAS GLANDULUER CHANGE THE DR AT THE HOSPITAL SAID TO WAIT 6 MONTHS AND COME BACK FOR ANOTHER TEST I DONT KNOW WHAT TO DO ?? THE LUMP I FOUND WAS RIGHT BEFORE MY PERIOD AND ALSO THE TEST WERE DONE THE SECOND DAY OF MY PERIOD WHOULD THIS MAKE A DIFFERENCE IM 34 WITH NO FAMILY HISTORY BUT STILL VERY WORRIED PLEASE ANY ADVISE WOULD HELP THANKS WENDY
Posts.Title: QUESTION S ABOUT A MAMOGRAM
